content:
I do not have personal opinions or preferences, but i can say that the excitement of watching traditional or olympic-style boxing can depend on an individual's interests and knowledge of the sport. 

for some people, the raw power and aggression of traditional boxing can be more thrilling, as the focus is on knockouts and big punches. others may prefer the strategy and technical skills displayed in olympic-style boxing, where fighters must score points through precise and controlled punches. 

ultimately it comes down to personal preference and what one finds exciting about the sport. both forms of boxing have their unique qualities and attributes that make them thrilling to watch, and each has its own fan base.
